content:
I work for the Regional Government of Cusco as part of the Social Development team. Our team is responsible for setting up the first Regional Development Agency in the department. Aiming to design, implement and rigorously evaluate the Regional Government's social interventions.
My research interests include development economics, financial literacy, behavioral insights, and political science. I am part of a project investigating the role of participatory spaces as a form of citizen participation in social development. For more details, you can read my vitae.
summary:
I work for the Regional Government of Cusco as part of the Social Development team. Our team is responsible for setting up the first Regional Development Agency in the department. Aiming to design, implement and rigorously evaluate the Regional Government's social interventions.
My research interests include development economics, financial literacy, behavioral insights, and political science. I am part of a project investigating the role of participatory spaces as a form of citizen participation in social development.

title: An example journal article

summary: In this paper we explore the degree to which participatory spaces have had an impact on development outcomes in Peru. We use an instrumental variables design to identify the causal relationship between participatory spaces and development outcomes. Using public trust as our instrument, we identify the causal impact of participatory spaces on development outcomes. Our results suggest that participatory spaces have had no impact in development outcomes during the 2008-2018 period.
title: How participatory spaces impact development outcomes: Evidence from Peru
